attributes.action: Prevent the Role of Prime Minister being Hijacked after the Referendum Result
attributes.background: In the wake of the referendum result we need stable leadership that represents the interests and concerns of ALL citizens. We, the undersigned, are concerned that the position of Prime Minister is being hijacked by opportunistic leave campaigners (e.g. Boris Johnson) who are unfit to represent us.

rejection.details:
If you would like the public to be able to choose the Prime Minister directly, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/138181
